statements: SELECT * FROM AirPollutionData;
SELECT location_name, pollution_level FROM AirPollutionData ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM AirPollutionData WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT location_name, AVG(pollution_level) AS average_pollution_level FROM AirPollutionData GROUP BY location_name;
SELECT * FROM AirPollutionData WHERE location_name LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM AirPollutionData WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT location_name, pollution_level FROM AirPollutionData WHERE location_id = 10
SELECT AVG(pollution_level) AS average_pollution_level FROM AirPollutionData GROUP BY location_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT location_name, MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution_level FROM AirPollutionData GROUP BY location_name ORDER BY max_pollution_level DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location_name) AS unique_locations FROM AirPollutionData
SELECT * FROM areas;
SELECT area_name, pollution_level FROM areas ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;
SELECT area_id, area_name, pollution_level FROM areas WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM measurements ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT measurement_id, area_id, timestamp, pollution_reading FROM measurements WHERE pollution_reading < 10;
SELECT * FROM areas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT area_name, pollution_level FROM areas WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT area_name, MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution FROM areas GROUP BY area_name;
SELECT m.area_id, a.area_name, m.timestamp, m.pollution_reading FROM measurements m JOIN areas a ON m.area_id = a.area_id ORDER BY m.timestamp DESC;
SELECT a.area_name, AVG(m.pollution_reading) AS avg_pollution FROM measurements m JOIN areas a ON m.area_id = a.area_id GROUP BY a.area_name HAVING AVG(m.pollution_reading) > 60;
SELECT * FROM areas;
SELECT area_name, pollution_level FROM areas WHERE pollution_level > 5;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM measurements WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT area_name, AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution FROM areas GROUP BY area_name;
SELECT area_name, pollution_level FROM areas WHERE pollution_level > 5 ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT s.*, m.measurement_value FROM sensors s INNER JOIN measurements m ON s.sensor_id = m.sensor_id WHERE m.measurement_value < 50 ORDER BY s.sensor_name ASC, m.measurement_value DESC;

SELECT m.*, s.sensor_name, a.area_name FROM measurements m LEFT JOIN sensors s ON m.sensor_id = s.sensor_id LEFT JOIN areas a ON s.area_id = a.area_id WHERE m.measurement_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY m.measurement_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution_level FROM areas GROUP BY area_name HAVING AVG(pollution_level) > 3 ORDER BY avg_pollution_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM areas;
SELECT area_name, pollution_level FROM areas WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT area_name, city_name FROM areas JOIN cities ON cities.city_id = areas.aid;
SELECT sensor_type, installation_date FROM sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT city_name, population FROM cities ORDER BY population ASC;
SELECT area_name, pollution_level FROM areas WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY area_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT area_name, pollution_level FROM areas WHERE pollution_level < 30 OR pollution_level > 70 ORDER BY pollution_level ASC, area_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM pollution_data WHERE area_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT city_name, population FROM cities WHERE population BETWEEN 1000000 AND 5000000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, installation_date FROM sensors WHERE area_id = 1 ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM area;
SELECT id, name FROM area ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM pollution_level WHERE level > 5;
SELECT name, level FROM pollution_level JOIN area ON pollution_level.area_id = area.id;
SELECT * FROM pollution_measurements WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT name, population FROM area WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT area.name, pollution_level.level FROM area JOIN pollution_level ON area.id = pollution_level.area_id WHERE pollution_level.level > 5;
SELECT area.name, pollution_measurements.level FROM area JOIN pollution_measurements ON area.id = pollution_measurements.area_id WHERE pollution_measurements.date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT pollution_source.name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM pollution_source JOIN pollution_level ON pollution_source.id = pollution_level.id GROUP BY pollution_source.name ORDER BY count DESC;

SELECT area.name, air_quality_standards.standard FROM area JOIN pollution_measurements ON area.id = pollution_measurements.area_id JOIN air_quality_standards ON pollution_measurements.level > air_quality_standards.standard;
